attributes.review:
this app is a danger to society, upon download, my moral compass decided to pass away, before knowing it was to leave a one star review, my dog cried too. also i now have what is the the equivalent to the coronavirus on my phone, this app spreads germs i suppose... i also got a paper cut on my tongue and a staple fly into my eyelid... the audacity. i would write more but i have to go save all the tiktoks that have made me cry laughing to my camera role before the gremli- i mean trump, bans it 😗

sorry, i don’t like stale, racist, homophobic cheetos :) 

🧚‍♀️💫all for the tiktok🦋✨
attributes.title: no

attributes.review: right off the bat this app is trash. when you open the app the first thing you see is this weird cheeto man. he looks like my finger after indulging in a family sized bag of cheetos. it took 294 hours to download this app and every time i open it it crashes. my friend also left a 1 star review and within 15 mins she went missing. on her home security cameras there was footage of her being knocked unconscious and dragged away by the cheeto mans wig. so unacceptable. so if i go missing just know the wig took me.
attributes.title: cheeto man

attributes.review: Tried to download the app and it glitches before I could set up an account. Seems very cheaply put together with the way it was freezing I don’t feel safe with the app. I feel as if it has a lot of security breaches and could lead my phone vulnerable to hackers.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my president. first of all it took 3 and a half weeks to download. when i tried to delete it it told me i was a big stinky head! then, it hacked my phone and stole all my money. I HATE THIS APP AND WANT TAKEN DOWN NOW!!!! it also child my third born child 😢
attributes.title: this app broke my phone!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app for my grandmother, and she started believing every single word this horrendous app had told her. She was told to lick every door handle to “own the libs” for “making up the coronavirus.” With listening to these abominations, she contracted the virus and died :(
attributes.title: My grandmother died because of this app

attributes.review: I tried to download this app 420 hours ago but it JUST finished. I also thought I would be able to see all the info for the upcoming election but I was not able too. Overall this app is very disappointing
attributes.title: Very disappointed

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our cheeto leader but now i realized that this app is no good man, it stole my pancake right out of my hand and ran off to go get married to my math teacher.🙄😡 I don’t recommend getting this app it’s a waste of space in your phone our fried cheeto leader ain’t worth it✨💅🧚
attributes.title: y’all...

attributes.review: I couldn’t wait to support my great President!! But the app is so laggy! I am very disappointed in this. When I tried getting into the app, It IMMEDIATELY to me to my home page!! I kept refreshing my page but nothin changed!! I do not recommend this at all!!
attributes.title: Worst quality ever!

attributes.review: Disappointed. App took a while to download and it doesn’t even offer to translate anything to Spanish :(((( this app is not good. I have wasted two days of my life to try and get this app. Ashamed. Make the app offer Spanish translation, English is not the official language of the U.S..
attributes.title: Review

attributes.review: Legit the worst app ever, it was super slow and kept me super misinformed. Anyone that says it’s good is giving you some FAKE NEWS.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
